```{r Clear memory and setup}
rm(list=ls())
options(scipen=999)
```


```{r Packages}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r Load Data}
volumes <- read.csv("../input/volumes_all_opt_percentile.csv")
```

```{r Clean up}
volumes <- volumes[,-1] #Drops 'X' which is just the index attached by Python
```

```{r Create years}
years <- seq(1510,1890, by=1)
```

```{r Create year dumies}
obs <- nrow(volumes)
for (year in years){
  assign(paste0(year), ifelse(volumes$Year_rounded >= (year - 10) && volumes$Year_rounded <= (year + 10), 1, 0))
}


```
